entry.title: Very Good Girl Eau De Parfum for Women by Carolina Herrera
entry.summary:
Vendor: Carolina Herrera
Type: Eau De Parfum Spray
Price: 74.95 - 131.95 (3 variants)

Embrace the captivating allure of Carolina Herrera's Very Good Girl perfume. This enchanting fragrance embodies the modern woman's duality, seamlessly blending sweetness and seduction. The scent unfolds with vibrant bursts of luscious red currant and Litchi, transitioning into a floral heart of the captivating rose. A base of earthy Vetiver and creamy vanilla imparts a sensual touch, leaving a trail of irresistible charm. Housed in a stunning stiletto-shaped bottle, Very Good Girl perfume is a declaration of sophistication and femininity.

entry.title: Good Girl Supreme by Carolina Herrera for Women - EDP Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Carolina Herrera
Type: Eau de Parfum
Price: 106.95 - 131.95 (2 variants)

Launched by design house of Carolina Herrera. Good Girl Eau de Parfum Suprme breaks all perfume rules, reinventing its olfactory family. Juicy gourmand Berries give way to aphrodisiac personality of intense Egyptian Jasmine, while creamy Tonka Beans and sparkling Vetiver give a modern twist to final formula.

entry.title: 212 Sexy Men Eau de Toilette Spray for Men by Carolina Herrera
entry.summary:
Vendor: Carolina Herrera
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 72.95 - 91.95 (2 variants)

With warm spices like cardamom and vanilla, Carolina Herrera 212 Sexy for men combines husky oriental notes with fresh citrus notes like mandarin and bergamot. Designed specifically to suit the seductive, sensual, tempting man, Carolina Hererra 212 Sexy does exactly as its name suggestsÃÂ£it makes its wearer indescribably sexy.

entry.title: 212 Vip Black Eau de Parfum Spray for Men by Carolina Herrera
entry.summary:
Vendor: Carolina Herrera
Type: Eau de Parfum
Price: 64.95 - 118.95 (3 variants)

212 VIP Black is the result of careful concoction by renowned perfumers Anne Filpo and Carlos Benaim. It opens with a soft spicy tone with absinthe, fennel. and anise as top notes. This is followed by a soft lavender tone, and finally, black vanilla husk and musk finish it off as base notes.

entry.title: Chic by Carolina Herrera for Women - EDP Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Carolina Herrera
Type: Eau de Parfum
Price: 51.02

Launched by the design house of Carolina Herrera in the year 1988. This floral fragrance has a blend of tuberose, bulgarian rose, red freesia, orange blossom, freesia, lily-of-the-valley, mandarin blossom, sandalwood, vanilla, and musk.

entry.title: Good Girl Eau de Parfum Legere for Women by Caroline Herrera
entry.summary:
Vendor: Carolina Herrera
Type: Eau de Parfum
Price: 68.95 - 119.95 (3 variants)

Good Girl Eau De Parfum EDP Legere is a fresher, bold evolution of the iconic GOOD GIRL fragrance. A glamorous symbol of empowerment, GOOD GIRL Eau De Parfum Legere embraces your good side and bad â in a luminous, sophisticated fragrance. An innovative fragrance, signed by women, that invites to have fun and be naughty, because its good to be bad!

Top Notes: Bergamot, Lemon, Mandarin
Heart Notes: Jasmine sambac imperial, Bulgarian rose, Ylang ylang, Caramel, Orange blossom, Cinnamon
Base Notes: Tonka bean, Sandalwood, Cedarwood, Cashmeran, Patchouli, Amber, Musk

entry.title: Good Girl For Women By Carolina Herrera Eau De Parfum Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Carolina Herrera
Type: Eau de Parfum
Price: 68.95 - 149.95 (4 variants)

Good Girl perfume was launched by Carolina Herrera in September 2016 and has a huge following of dedicated users worldwide. Its fresh, yet dark fragrance represents the two sides of every woman - the good and the bad. With jasmine and tuberose making up the fresh, feminine side; cocoa and tonka bean are used for the intoxicatingly dark side. It's delicate yet empowering - the perfect femme fatale fragrance. After all, it's good to be bad.

entry.title: CH For Women By Carolina Herrera Eau De Toilette Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Carolina Herrera
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 85.95 - 108.95 (2 variants)

An emulsion of floral and fresh notes, the new Carolina Herrera for women scent is exquisitely crafted for modern women. While spices lend the scent a hint of the exotic, woody base notes lend it strength. A scent for the bold and fierce woman, Carolina Herrera for women celebrates the contemporary woman.

entry.title: Chic by Carolina Herrera for Men - Eau de Toilette
entry.summary:
Vendor: Carolina Herrera
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 57.99 - 59.95 (2 variants)

Launched by the design house of Carolina Herrera in the year 2004. This masculine fragrance has a blend of italian bergamont, watermelon, black pepper oil, sandalwood, and musky notes. It is recommended for casual wear.

entry.title: CH For Men By Carolina Herrera Eau De Toilette Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Carolina Herrera
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 61.95 - 92.95 (3 variants)

Developed for the modern man, Carolina Herrera for men combines dignity and creativity seamlessly. The Carolina Herrera for men man is professional, energetic, active, slightly eccentric, and ever the consummate gentleman. Hints of spice tones like nutmeg add a sense of unpredictability to the scent, evoking characteristics like spontaneity.

Redolent with fresh notes including verdants and citrus, Carolina Herrera 212 Men is perfect for man on move. Floral notes soften scent a small amount while a strong woodsy base makes it unmistakably masculine. A hint of incense and sandalwood provide an exciting touch of exoticism.

entry.title: 212 VIP For Men By Carolina Herrera Eau De Toilette Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Carolina Herrera
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 72.95 - 116.95 (3 variants)

Are you on the list? Because you should be. 212 V.I.P. by Carolina Herrera is an exclusive scent for men who are plugged into the heartbeat of powerful cities. Consummate professionals by day and irresistible by night, these men are the cream of the crop, the elite. The scent combines hints of spices and exotic fruits like passionfruit to suit the unforgettable, and suave, city man.

entry.title: 212 Eau de Toilette Spray for Women by Carolina Herrera
entry.summary:
Vendor: Carolina Herrera
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 85.95 - 105.95 (2 variants)

Evoking the soaring heights of the skyscrapers that make the skyline of any major city in the world, the light, airy and edgy scent of Carolina Herrera 212 is developed for the young, working woman. The floral tones give way to a solid sandalwood and musk base, strength beneath grace. The scent is long-lasting, perfect for all day wear.
